entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Alma
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
